main event: A bright white object was observed rising rapidly 45 degrees in the sky, hovering, and then disappearing over Atlanta, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was in sight for 7-8 minutes.
The object rose rapidly 45 degrees in the sky before hovering and then disappearing.
The report includes photographs of the sighting.
Investigators were unable to definitively identify the object as an aircraft.
The sighting occurred on November 10, 1957 at 0535Z.
